# Supacoat E-commerce Website Project

This project is a Next.js-based e-commerce website for Supacoat, featuring:
- Modern, responsive design
- Product showcase with WhatsApp integration
- TypeScript and Tailwind CSS
- Optimized for coating/paint products business

## Progress

- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [ ] Scaffold Next.js project structure
- [ ] Customize project for Supacoat
- [ ] Install dependencies
- [ ] Create and run dev task
- [ ] Finalize documentation
